snippet: A militant detained for attacking the United States Embassy in Tunisia died Thursday when he suffered a heart attack after he conducted a two-month hunger strike to protest his innocence.
lead_paragraph: A militant detained for attacking the United States Embassy in Tunisia died Thursday when he suffered a heart attack after he conducted a two-month hunger strike to protest his innocence.

headline.main: Tunisia: Suspect Held in Embassy Attack Dies in Prison
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Suspect Held in Embassy Attack Dies in Prison
